name: UIDocumentPickerDelegate
desc: A set of methods for tracking when the user selects a document or destination, or cancels the operation.

items.name: func documentPicker(UIDocumentPickerViewController, didPickDocumentsAt: [URL])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has selected one or more documents.

items.name: func documentPickerWasCancelled(UIDocumentPickerViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user canceled the document picker.
